trajectory.mention: Our starting point shall be Penrith
From Penrith two roads lead to Pooley Bridge
the road runs along the western shore of Ulleswater To Patterdale
trajectory.note: travel along Ulleswater to reach Patterdale

trajectory.mention: the lake may be seen while travelling to Ambleside
the traveller should now proceed to Keswick

route_summary: Penrith → Pooley Bridge → Patterdale → Ambleside → Keswick
